article_title: Clever hashtag perfectly captures liberalism in four words – twitchy.com
article_text:
There are many ways to sum up liberalism in four words. Here are a few.

#SaySomethingLiberalIn4Words Pajamaboy is my hero. — Libero Sum (@LiberumThinker) March 9, 2014

#SaySomethingLiberalIn4Words All guns are bad — Josh LaFon (@JTLafon) March 9, 2014

#SaySomethingLiberalIn4Words "Thrill up my leg" — Sheep Doctor (@Hauckers) March 9, 2014

#SaySomethingLiberalIn4Words "punished with a baby." — DancingThroughLife (@JaneShaffmaster) March 9, 2014

#SaySomethingLiberalIn4Words Tolerance! Now shut up. — Razor (@hale_razor) March 9, 2014

#SaySomethingLiberalIn4Words You didn't build that. — Hey Mikie! (@stlavgjoe) March 9, 2014

#SaySomethingLiberalIn4Words Pass, then read it — Bella Pelosi (@BellaPelosi) March 9, 2014

https://twitter.com/george_collard/status/442704821955887104

Stop being hostile, teabagger. #SaySomethingLiberalIn4Words — Jim Treacher (@jtLOL) March 9, 2014

American interests are archaic #SaySomethingLiberalIn4Words — Ben Shapiro (@benshapiro) March 9, 2014

Power corrupts other people #SaySomethingLiberalIn4Words — GR Hutson (@jess_reign_bass) March 9, 2014

#SaySomethingLiberalIn4Words – only conservatives are racist — #NeverHagatha (@bhewing1) March 9, 2014

#SaySomethingLiberalIn4Words who needs the Constitution? — andthenwhat? (@NWcarol28) March 9, 2014
